message:
The topic title may not make quite as much sense as I had hoped. All I really wished to convey was my consternation after having selected "leave group" when what I really wanted to do was banish a topic. So I feel I have suffered (speaking purely metaphorically) from coitus interruptus in several Django threads.

Could we perhaps try something like "Banish this poster/topic/group" - possibly separately from the existing group control, since some group actions don't make sense at lower granularity.

Alternatively, add hierarchical links on the green bar, so you have "Topic Action", "Poster Action","Group Action" -- and maybe more your fertile imaginations can dream up.
Didn't like convore at first, but it does seem to blend the best of Twitter and Usenet. Easy to define streams and dip in and out as your fancy (and availability) dictates.
if you are talking about Usenet, maybe we need a kill-file like feature, either adding topics to a kill-file or a keyword/regex based
